short_description.message: Track and manage outgoing funding programs.

description.message:
Welcome to the Outbound Funds Module installer!

The Outbound Funds Module gives you the tools to easily manage and track funding requests and outgoing funds.  

*IMPORTANT*: Salesforce does not recommend installing upgrades directly in production organizations. Instead, install Outbound Funds Module in one of your free sandbox environments or a developer organization first.

Once you've installed Outbound Funds Module, check out resources on getting started in our documentation:

* [Outbound Funds Module Documentation](https://powerofus.force.com/s/article/OBF-Documentation)

Questions? Become a member of the [Outbound Funds Module](https://powerofus.force.com/s/group/0F980000000CvlMCAS) community group in the Power of Us Hub.

error_message.message: To get help with this error, go to [help.salesforce.com](https://help.salesforce.com/), find the Support & Services area, and log a technical support ticket with Salesforce. Include “Outbound Funds Module” in the subject line and include in your comment the installation link shown here.

preflight_message.message: This will install Outbound Funds Module into your org.

post_install_message.message: Thanks for installing Outbound Funds Module. Please visit the [Outbound Funds Module](https://powerofus.force.com/s/group/0F980000000CvlMCAS) community group on the Power of Us Hub for any questions about Outbound Funds Module.
